markdown.markdown:
I am a Master's student at the **Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar**, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. My research focuses on developing practical AI systems that can be applied to solve real-world challenges.

## Key Achievements

- **GATE Rank:** 733 (All India)
- **Research Projects:** 5+
- **Publications:** 3

## Technical Skills

::: {.panel-tabset}

### Programming
- **Python** - Advanced
- **C/C++** - Proficient  
- **Java** - Intermediate
- **MATLAB** - Proficient
- **R** - Intermediate

### AI & Machine Learning
- **Deep Learning** - TensorFlow, PyTorch
- **Natural Language Processing**
- **Computer Vision** - OpenCV, PIL
- **Reinforcement Learning**
- **Neural Networks** - CNNs, RNNs, Transformers

### Data Science
- **Data Analysis** - Pandas, NumPy
- **Visualization** - Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
- **Statistical Modeling**
- **Big Data** - Spark, Hadoop
- **Database** - SQL, MongoDB

### Tools & Frameworks
- **Git** - Version Control
- **Docker** - Containerization
- **AWS/GCP** - Cloud Computing
- **Jupyter** - Interactive Development
- **Linux** - System Administration

:::

## Research Interests

My research primarily focuses on:

1. **Deep Learning Architectures** - Exploring novel neural network designs
2. **Computer Vision** - Developing robust vision systems  
3. **Natural Language Processing** - Creating intelligent text understanding systems
4. **AI Ethics** - Ensuring responsible AI development

## Education

**Master of Technology - Computer Science & Engineering**  
*Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar* | 2023 - Present

## Contact

I'm always excited to collaborate on interesting AI projects or discuss research opportunities!

**Email:** [vinayak.rana@iitgn.ac.in](mailto:vinayak.rana@iitgn.ac.in)  
**LinkedIn:** [Connect with me](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinayak-rana-a841bb243/)  
**GitHub:** [View my code](https://github.com/vinayakrana)  
**Kaggle:** [Competition profile](https://www.kaggle.com/vinayak4444)
